articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description:
Justin Godel, a 49-year-old Winston resident, lost his life Thursday afternoon in a logging accident. The incident occurred while Godel was working for Dancer Logging at a site on Upper Cow Creek Road near Azalea, Oregon.
Emergency services were alerted to the serious injury at approximately 3:20 p.m.
articles.title: Tragic Logging Accident Claims Life Near Azalea
